Title: Exempts "non-profit housing development fund corporations" in New York city from payment for water usage and supply
Summary: Exempts "non-profit housing development fund corporations" in New York city from payment for water usage and supply.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 696 of the laws of 1887 relating to providing hospitals, orphan asylums and other charitable institutions in the city of New York with water and remitting assessments therefor, in relation to exempting certain housing development fund corporations from payment for water usage and supply
